item.title: Monte Verità Workshop 2023
item.description: I was fortunate to spend this last week at Monte Verità in Switzerland, attending a workshop on decoding musical structure.

item.title: MCG Reading: McPherson & McDermott 2023
item.description: This week for the Music Cognition Reading Group we read Relative pitch representations and invariance to timbre by Malinda McPherson and Josh McDermott.

item.title: Calculating iMultisets in R
item.description: November is pretty much the worst month for people in higher education.
